org.jetel.data.reader

Class DriverReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.reader.InputReader
      • org.jetel.data.reader.DriverReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInputReader

    public class DriverReader
extends InputReader
    Reader for driver input. Doesn't use record buffer but also doesn't support rewind operation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.jetel.data.reader.IInputReader

                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: IInputReader
        Retrieves one record from current run. Modifies internal data so that next call of this operation will return following record.

      • getOrdering

        public IInputReader.InputOrdering getOrdering()
        Description copied from interface: IInputReader
        Returns recognized ordering of input data. It may change during data processing. i.e. at first it's UNDEFINED, when greater value is loaded it's ASCENDING and if some of next value is lower it may change to UNSORTED.
        Specified by:
        getOrdering in interface IInputReader
        Specified by:
        getOrdering in class InputReader
        Returns:
